LanguageData.VCE_NoSoupsFound: No soups of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.VCE_SelectSoup: Select a type of soup to be cooked
LanguageData.VCE_StartInsertionDesc: Bring a soup to the electric pot to start cooking
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveSoupDesc: Remove the soup from the pot. This can only be done before you start cooking it.
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingSoupDesc: Cancel bringing soup to the electric pot.
LanguageData.VCE_WaitTillJobsEnd: Wait until the soup has been brought to the electric pot, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.VCE_NotPowered: The electric pot is not powered
LanguageData.VCE_EngageDesc: Start cooking soup. This process takes 3 days and can't be interrupted, or the soup will be destroyed.
LanguageData.VCE_SoupFailurePower: The soup has spoiled due to a power failure in the electric pot
LanguageData.VCE_SoupFinished: A soup has finished cooking in the electric pot
LanguageData.VCE_SoupInProgress: An {0} is cooking. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.VCE_SoupReady: A soup has finished cooking and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_InsertMilkDesc: Select Milk to press in the cheese press. Different milks might produce different types of cheese.
LanguageData.VCE_NoMilksFound: No milks of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.VCE_SelectMilk: Select a type of milk to be pressed
LanguageData.VCE_StartInsertionMilkDesc: Bring milk to the cheese press to start pressing
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveMilkDesc: Remove the milk from the press. This can only be done before you start pressing it.
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingMilkDesc: Cancel bringing milk to the cheese press.
LanguageData.VCE_WaitTillJobsEndMilk: Wait until the milk has been brought to the cheese press, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.VCE_EngageMilkDesc: Start pressing milk into cheese. This process takes a variable time and cheese will increase in quality with ripening. You can remove it at any time after the initial period.
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseFinished: A cheese has finished ripening in the cheese press
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseInProgress: Cheese press is pressing {0}. It will be ready with {1} quality in {2}
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseReady: This cheese has reached its desired degree of ripening and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_MilkImproperlyDefined: This milk has been improperly defined to work with the cheese press, contact the milk mod's author
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveCheeseDesc: Remove cheese from the cheese press. The cheese will be ready at the present quality level ({0})
LanguageData.VCE_CheesePressEmpty: Cheese press is empty right now
